welcome.welcome: 🎉 Awesome choice! You're all set! 🚀 FluxGuard is now fully charged and ready to roll! ⚡ Just tell me what you need, and I’ll handle it like a pro! 💼✨ Whether it’s shutting down your PC, sneaking a peek at your screen 👀, or zipping files like a ninja 🥷—I’m here to serve! 🙌 So, what’s the first mission, boss? 😎

power.power: 💡 The Power Dashboard is open! Ready to shut down, restart, or put your system to sleep. Whatever you command, boss! 😎

status.status: 📊 The Status Dashboard is here! Time to check the health of your system. I promise to keep it honest and straightforward! 🤓

apps.apps: 📂 The Apps Dashboard is ready! Tell me which app to manage or launch a new one. Just don’t make me too hard on them! 😜

send.send: 📤 The Send Dashboard is locked and loaded! Wanna send a file, play a funny voice on your system, or even display some media? I can handle it all! 🎯

file_explorer.file_explorer: 📁 The File Explorer Dashboard is open! Let’s explore your folders like pro detectives. Maybe we’ll even find some treasure! 🕵️‍

security.security: 🛡️ The Security Dashboard is now active! I’m ready to keep an eye on everything and report any threats. Like a ninja in the shadows! 🥷
